question:
Which of the following forms of functions are associated with Election Commission of India?
1. Administrative
2. Advisory
3. Quasi-Judicial
4. Defense
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The powers and functions of the Election Commission of India with respect to elections to the Parliament of India, state legislatures and offices of President and Vice-President can be classified into three categories, viz, (1) Administrative, (2) Advisory and (3) Quasi-Judicial.
